Language.The_truth_behind_Sector_ZZ_Omega_9_remai: Die Wahrheit hinter Sector ZZ-Omega-9 bleibt ein Geheimnis.
Language.The_truth_behind_Sector_ZZ_Omega_9_dies_: Die Wahrheit hinter Sector ZZ-Omega-9 stirbt mit Ihnen.
Language.The_truth_behind_Sector_ZZ_Omega_9_will_: #The truth behind Sector ZZ-Omega-9 will be revealed!#
Language.Improved_Thrusters_Description: Erhöht die Kontrolle durch die Verbesserung stoppen Geschwindigkeit.
Language.Second_Weapon_Slot_Description: #Allows you to simultaneously equip up to two weapons. Your second weapon will operate at 2/3 speed.#
Language.Third_Weapon_Slot_Description: #Allows you to simultaneously equip up to three weapons. Your third weapon will operate at 1/3 speed.#
Language.This_ship_part_has_not_been_identified: #This ship part has not been identified.#
Language.Cannot_equip_ship_parts_while_on_a_plane: Kann nicht auf dem Planeten ausrüsten
Language.You_can_use_Alien_Artifacts_while_on_a_p: (Sie können Ihre Alien Artefakte, während auf einem Planeten oder im Raum zu verwenden.)
Language.You_can_use_Advanced_Technology_while_on: #(You can use Advanced Technology while on a planet, or in space.)#
Language.To_quit_press_A_or_ENTER_now: #To quit, press A or ENTER now.#
Language.You_have_never_used_this_kind_of_Alien_A: Sie haben noch nie diese Art von Alien Artifact verwendet vor. Die Auswirkungen wird es auf Ihrem Schiff unbekannt.
Language.You_have_never_used_this_kind_of_Advance: Sie haben noch nie diese Art von Advanced Technology verwendet, vor. Die Auswirkungen wird es haben, sind nicht bekannt.
Language.Resists_X_percent_of_damage_resulting_fr: Beständig gegen %percent%% der Schäden durch Kollisionen ergeb.
Language.Light_Lukida_Description:
Ein kleines, schnelles Schiff.
* +20% Geschwindigkeit * Wenn gebremst wird für 50% weniger Zeit verlangsamt * -1 Rumpf * Maximal 2 Waffenplätze
Language.Alien_Alwaid_Description:
Ein außerirdisches Schiff.
* Statt ihrer normalen Wirkungen, Artefakte verdoppeln Schildregen für 3 Sekunden und Reparaturen 1 Panzerung und Rumpf * Beginnen mit einem EMP-resistente Schild * -10% Geschwindigkeit * -1 Rumpf
Language.Alien_Alwaid_Alien_Artifact_Effect_Descr: Verdoppeln Schildregen für 3 Sekunden und Reparaturen 1 Panzerung und Rumpf.
Language.MAINTENANCE_CHECK:
#Sorry to wake you, but it's time for another 100LY maintenance check.
There are no outstanding issues requiring your attention. Hardware and software operations appear normal.
How do you feel?#
Language.TUTORIALIZE_OPTION:
#Good.
Before shutting down, would you like to do some exercises?#
Language.TUTORIAL_MINIBOSS_APPROACHES:
#Wait.
Captain, I'm picking something up... a ship is approaching us. I'm having trouble making contact; it's an old ship, and badly damaged.#
Language.TUTORIAL_MINIBOSS_APPROACHES_2:
#Captain, it's readying its weapons. It may be old and damaged, but this is definitely a warship.
Try to disable it by force; while you're doing that, I'll attempt to hack in and gain control of it.#
Language.END_OF_TUTORIAL_NEUTRALIZED: #Captain, I've gained control of the ship. I'm shutting it down now.#
Language.END_OF_TUTORIAL_DESTROYED:
#Well done, captain.
Sorry I wasn't able to shut it down faster; it's more badly-damaged than I thought.
I was able to get some information, however.#
Language.END_OF_TUTORIAL_2:
#The ship's memories show that it was indeed a warship. It was badly damaged in a skirmish 526 years ago and has been drifting, derelict, since.
It's hard to say where the rest of its kind are, since the information it has is about 526 years old; with any luck we won't have any more run-ins.#
Language.END_OF_TUTORIAL_3: #Anyway, as this is the last maintenance check before we reach Sector ZZ-Omega-9, I recommend conserving as much Fuel as possible. We don't want to to be caught unprepared for whatever lies in store for us.#
Language.LAVA_INFO: #I feel I should remind you that our shields were not designed for the high temperatures of lava. While they will technically hold, we will not be able to regenerate them while submerged.#
Language.MYSTERIOUS_FORCE_EXPLANATION:
#Sorry to wake you, but there's an emergency: an unidentified force is causing us to decelerate.
While currently negligible, this force is increasing as we approach the ZZ-Omega cluster.
If this force increases at its current rate, we will not have enough Fuel to return home.#
Language.WEAKENED_EXPLANATION:
#One of our ship parts is Weakened!
We can continue using this part, but be aware that further Weakening will completely destroy it.#
Language.EXPLAIN_POCKET_DIMENSION:
#We appear to have fallen into a pocket of folded space. That alien structure was probably there to protect against this very event, but was disrupted by our tractor beam.
Our ship isn't powerful enough to go against the gravitational fields. We'll just have to let them carry us along, and out the other end.#
Language.EXPLAIN_POCKET_DIMENSION_2:
#Wait.
Captain, I'm picking something up... a ship, or what's left of it. Pieces of its debris have become tangled in the gravitational field.
There's also fragments we may be able to use as fuel. If possible, we should pick these up, but survival is our top priority.#
Language.Its_dangerous_to_go_alone_take_this: #It's dangerous to go alone! Take this.#
Language.PRACTICE_MOVING_TUTORIAL:
#Great! Let's begin!
Move the ship using %input%.#
Language.PRACTICE_SHOOTING_TUTORIAL:
#Unfortunately, there isn't anything out here to practice shooting at. A holographic projection will have to do.
I'll create several holograms; practice moving while holding %input% to fire at them.#
